WorkItem.Description:
Redesign Renderer to use strategy pattern taken different way to draw QrCode at specific size.

Fixed module pixel size: module pixel size will be fixed, thus QrCode size will vary according to matrix size and module pixel size.

Fixed Code pixel size: QrCode pixel size will be fixed, module pixel size may vary according to that.

 

WinForm renderer will be still using Graphics.

WPF renderer will be separate to DrawingBrush and WriteableBitmap. Remove drawingContext renderer.

DrawingBrush will be vector based approach.

WriteableBitmap will be good at performance, but quality won't be as good if choose fixed code pixel size.

 

Redo Winform and WPF controls according to renderer.
WorkItem.Summary: Redesign Renderer classes and WinForm WPF controls
